_description: This preprocessing function splits csv annotation file according to given weights.

outfiles._description: Output csv filenames, comma separated. If not provided, the default value is given as csvfile_0.csv, csvfile_1.csv, ...

header._description: Row number to use as the column names, and the start of the data.

encoding._description: Encoding to use for UTF when reading/writing (ex. "utf-8").

comment._description: Indicates remainder of line should not be parsed. For example, if comment="#", parsing#empty\na,b,c\n1,2,3 with header=0 will result in "a,b,c" being treated as the header.

name: split_data
